mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(SL_STCODE, SL_LOCODE, SL_STATE, SL_DATE, SL_ALDATE) VALUES(#{storeCode}, #{locationList[0].locationCode}, #{accessLogList[0].salesLogList[0].salesState}, SYSDATE, #{accessLogList[0].accessDate})

INSERT INTO POSDBA.STOREMENU(SM_CODE, SM_NAME, SM_PRICE, SM_SICODE) VALUES('S'||WEBDBA.MENUCODE.NEXTVAL, #{menuList[0].menuName}, #{menuList[0].menuPrice}, #{menuList[0].menuImageCode}, #{menuList[0].menuImageLocation})
